remarks: The composition of two continuous functions at point ` P ` is a continuous function at point ` P ` .  Proposition of [BourbakiTop1] p. I.9.  (Contributed by FL, 16-Nov-2006.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)
statement: cnpco $p |- ( ( F e. ( ( J CnP K ) ` P ) /\ G e. ( ( K CnP L ) ` ( F ` P ) ) ) -> ( G o. F ) e. ( ( J CnP L ) ` P ) ) $.
